Class org.webmacro.datatable.SimpleTableRow 

Object
   |
   +----AbstractMap
           |
           +----org.webmacro.datatable.SimpleTableRow
public class SimpleTableRow
extends AbstractMap
a class for managing a row of values within a table as an ordered Map.

See Also:
DataTable, SimpleDataTable

org.webmacro.datatable.SimpleTableRow. FieldSet
A Set of fields contained in the current row.
org.webmacro.datatable.SimpleTableRow. FieldSetEntry
An entry within the current FieldSet.
org.webmacro.datatable.SimpleTableRow. FieldSetIterator
Iterator for traversing the FieldSet for the current row.
org.webmacro.datatable.SimpleTableRow. RowAttribs
This class allows row attributes to be accessed within a WM template in a straightforward way.
